Storeroom, Furniture, Technique, Telephone, Internet, Cable-TV, corner, Elevator, Heating system: central, Hot water: gas 
 Selling apartment in new building of 12th floor (last floor) 90 Sq.M. in Tbilisi , District Avlabari . 2 bed rooms. (14 and 13 Sq.M) 2 closet . 1 bathroom (6 Sq.M). 1 studio living room (40 Sq.M) with 6 meters panoramic window vitrage . Beautiful view on Old Tbilisi . in Price included : Austrian Oak Parquet planks 'Weitzer' . Italian Granite 'La Fabbrica' . Wall decorations real American Walnut planks. Apartment are in modern mansard style (living room and bed rooms are H 2,60 m- and - closet side H 2,00 m) With Central heating . Phone . Internet .TV with 300 channels. 20 minute driving from airport and 5 minute driving from main part of old city. Price with Italian Kitchen with quartz top 'Veneta Cucine' is 75.000 USD (834 USD/Sq.M) David. Tel/ Mob : +995 599 76 76 00 / 599 70 70 01

details.address: Tbilisi, Isani,  Avlabari, Ketevan Tsamebuli ave., N 49
